From: Martin Berger <M.F.Berger@sussex.ac.uk>
Hello fellow theorem provers.

The Department of Informatics at the University of Sussex is hiring a
Lecturer, Senior Lecturer or Reader. This is a permanent position.
Somebody with experience in the theory and implementation of
interactive theorem provers would be a good fit for this position.

All details at

http://www.sussex.ac.uk/aboutus/jobs/352

Deadline is October 7th.

Martin
